==== genericFunctionsWithOptionalParameters2.ts (4 errors) ====

       fold<T, S>(c: Array<T>, folder?: (s: S, t: T) => T, init?: S): T;
    }
    
    declare var utils: Utils;
    
    utils.fold(); // error
          ~~~~
